datastructures

Class UserMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastructures.UserMap

  • public class UserMap
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for dealing with a list of users. This class is synchronized.
    Author:
    Romain Mormont

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserMap()
      Construct an empty list

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUser(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Adds a user in the list
      boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Returns true if the given password matches the user's one.
      void connect(java.lang.String username)
      Sets the given user connected
      void disconnect(java.lang.String username)
      Sets the given user disconnected
      java.lang.String getLastConnection(java.lang.String username)
      Returns the formatted date of the user's last connection
      boolean hasUser(java.lang.String username)
      Returns true whether the user (of given username) is in the list
      boolean isUserConnected(java.lang.String username)
      Returns true if the user is connecting
      void updateLastConnection(java.lang.String username)
      Updates the last connection date of the given user.

      • UserMap

        public UserMap()
        Construct an empty list

    • Method Detail

      • hasUser

        public boolean hasUser(java.lang.String username)
        Returns true whether the user (of given username) is in the list
        Parameters:
        username - a String containing the user name
        Returns:
        true if the user is in the list, false otherwise

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
                      throws UserNotFoundException
        Returns true if the given password matches the user's one. False is also returned if the user is not in the list.
        Parameters:
        username - a String containing the username
        password - a String containing the password
        Returns:
        true whether the password matches, false otherwise
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException

      • updateLastConnection

        public void updateLastConnection(java.lang.String username)
                          throws UserNotFoundException
        Updates the last connection date of the given user. Does nothing if the user is not in the list.
        Parameters:
        username - a String containing the username
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException

      • getLastConnection

        public java.lang.String getLastConnection(java.lang.String username)
                                   throws UserNotFoundException
        Returns the formatted date of the user's last connection
        Parameters:
        username - a String containing the username
        Returns:
        a String containing the formatted data (null if the user is not in the list)
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException

      • addUser

        public void addUser(java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password)
        Adds a user in the list
        Parameters:
        username - a String containing the username
        password - a String containing the password

      • isUserConnected

        public boolean isUserConnected(java.lang.String username)
                        throws UserNotFoundException
        Returns true if the user is connecting
        Parameters:
        username - a String containing the username
        Returns:
        true if the user is connected false otherwise
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException
